name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: This is hands down the best PC case you can find for a very fair price. If it's your first time building a PC, then I definitely recommend you this case as it's sooooo easy to install everything in it and it will take around 2 hours to install everything inside it meanwhile normally with other cases... it could take up to 5 hours. It also comes with 3 RGB fans which cost 30$ each separately. The material and quality on this case is the best you can fund out there. And after all... it's CORSAIR.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Thats the best case I had ever.I am not sure If all cases are that good in the recent days but that made my life much more enjoyable while installing my PC.The best part of this case is that the cables are pre-alligned. You only need to route your PSU cables which is very simple as the bad boy comes with cable wrappers.It comes with anti-dust mat which can hopefully prevent dust getting in, I dont know how it affects the airflow but it works well for my mid-high end pc with decent cpu/gpu temp.The rubbered legs are with good quality. Fans are not noisy as well. Only thing is the side panels are only attached via a hook, It can drop the panel if you open the side panels quickly.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Received the case, undamaged. Excellent quality case for my pc build, but I had a few missing screws within the packaging. Asked amazon if they could send me some but they unfortunately were unable to. Great case though.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Great case, spacious and well built. Two flaws, the built in RGB hub is missing its plastic housing, and one of the front fans has lost all LED functionality, which is a poor performance for a "RGB" case. Corsair support seems to be resolving it though. 7/10

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Too expensive, $250 is not cheap but it can fit 10 120mm fan inside and keep temps at 55 on a 35C+ hot day while working on it.Has plenty of room and was designed with water cooling in mind, very large case however, weighs 14kgs on its own.The HDD bay hasn't got enough clearance to fit with an average sized PSU, Corsair sell a PSU that fits comfortably but is also expensive, be sure to invest in SSDs instead and remove the HDD bay alltogether

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: First case I've bought in over 5 years, replacing my trusty Fractal Define R4, which was a very well insulated and quiet case.Building was very easy, and had proper cable management routing. The white lacquer paint where the motherboard sits on gets scratched easily, so be careful.Initial impressions was that it was noisy, but some fan tuning fixed that. As it is more airy, there will be more dust and that's where I'm hoping the dust filters do their job. Time will tell.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Prompt delivery.Great Product

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: So this is a nice minimalist case overall, but my previous case that I had was much better in terms of filtering dust. This case doesn't have a proper dust filter. Just a mesh and it gets dusty real fast. With this case I would need to dust out my pc every 6 months or less because it does start to pile up slowly whereas my other case I could leave it for 2 years or so because it had foam infront of the fan to filter that dust. Only complaint about it.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: The case worked like a dream, used for 13th gen intel and an RTX 3090. I decided to vertically mount my graphics card, the only problem is that you cannot see anything inside unless you have a ton of RGB. Apart from that Awesome temps and plenty of room for cable management

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: An excellent mid sized case with a glass side panel - be aware it is quite dark! I also heard that the glass panels are difficult to obtain in Australia. Other than that this is a well designed case. I removed the 3.5in HDD bay at the bottom and this gave me heaps more space behind the PSU. The bay also moves a bit forward if do you have 3.5in drives to give a bit more space for cables at the back of the PSU. There are heaps of options for different sized fans and rads. The back side has a channel for cables and it comes with screws and velco fasteners. Would recommend this product

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: This case is just very nice looking in every way, comes with 2 preinstalled Corsair SP Elite which are decent fans but if I knew the QL edition of this case existed I would have gotten it instead. Comes at the back wire lanes with Corsair velcro straps for easier cable management. Overall a very nice case.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Great case for the price.I really like the look of the front with the tessellated triangles, and even better that the tempered glass side panel is offset by the open front with easily removable dust filter. The case overall is nice and open, which means that you don't have to worry about populating the case with fans and optimising the fan pressure to get air through.The back of the case is spacious enough to accommodate bulky cables, and the removable cable guide is a great touch to help route and tie cables together.The downsides are that the grey feet and the front parts are plastic which feels a bit cheap, and that there's fairly limited I/O, e.g. ONLY ONE USB-A port in the front which takes up an entire USB3.0 header on the motherboard. It would have made more sense having 2 USB-A ports and a USB-C port instead of one of each.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: When removing the side panel, the glass shattered. While the side panel has retained its shape, the glass is visibly broken and will probably fall apart and explode if I attempt to use it.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Great tower with lots of airflow to keep everything cool. Multiple areas in tower for water cooling.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: having a bracket at the top so you can put a 360mm rad closer to the glass and away from the motherboard would be good, there's a bit of pinching of the CPU power cables without it.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Im very happy with the case! to be honest I was actually a little shocked when it came SO early, it was said to arrive on the 30th of December but came today the 21st of December. I do wish it came with more protection for the glass panel, but otherwise is a very nice and good looking case. As you can see in one of the pictures there is masking tape holding down the meshing on the top of the case - which I was very happy about because that reassured me that the meshing wouldn't be crinkled or something lol.Would definitely recommend this to my friends (especially since their cases are close to needing a new upgrade lol)can't wait to build my pc, loving the case - I hope putting my parts into the case won't be too much of a hassle.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: The case is perfect for the price, and you really can’t expect any more for the price point, however, it would be nice if the case included an rgb control button. It could also use an additional usb port or two, as it only has one. However, as said there are more premium models, so overall, I am very happy with the product and it meets my expectations when purchasing.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: heaps of space inside to fit larger GPU like RTX 4090, several areas for AIO coolers to be mounted, well thoughout layout. Cable management also excellent

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: It is a smaller to mid sized case that works well haven’t got any complaints about it yet. Has a lot of space for cable management if you get rid of the hard drive bay if you don’t it is a bit hard but still doable

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Thank you for a great product!

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: I was very happy with this case and its inclusions.  Unfortunately, the glass side panel shattered before I could complete my build.  I removed the glass panel and it dropped onto the table and bang it shattered.  Luckily the protective plastic was still in place or it would have been a huge mess to clean up.  Be very careful with the glass side panel as there are no replacement parts in Australia

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: I brought this case as i am building myself a pc which i still havnt finished so the plastic was still on the glass for the case and everything and when i was hand screwing in one of the other pannels the corner of the glass broke with nothing ever touching it the framing around the glass snapped and everything when i spoke to amazon they said it must be defective and wanted a picture so i sent them the picture i had already told them the glass was smashed but when i called back the next day because i didnt hear anything within 24 hours like they said they were very rude and not helpfull and when i mentioned the 2 year warrenty they hung up on me

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Built out of my H210i into the 4000d,And so happy i did.This case was easy to work with,Looks excellentAnd alot of room.Only cons i can come up with;The from USB & Other, the end of the ports aren't completely sleeved so you can see the green/white etcOnly came with 2 fans, 1 in rear and 1 in the front.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Built my first Pc in it and had no troubles. I really love the rgb fan header in the back of it and the pre routed cables. Didn't have much difficulty building my Pc in it and the included fans are good.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Haven’t built a machine in 20 years and was very pleasant surprise of the build quality and features!  No sharp edges and lots of good cable organisation.Good DIY case!

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: I ordered all the parts for my computer rebuild.The completed unit is impressive with the fans and lighting display.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Very nice looking case especially paired with the RGB (don't buy if you don't plan to have any RGB because the tempered glass makes it close to impossible to see anything that doesn't have any sort of lighting)

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Incredibly cramped.The psu shroud that makes restricts access to the bottom parts of your motherboard. It cannot be removed.The rear of the case is so tight you need absolutely perfect cable management to get everything to fit.There is a cable cover rather than grommets that is narrow and awkward to get cables around.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: I like it matches with my set up so good

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Great pc case, decent value but is quite large so I might need to work around it.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Fits my 6900XT at ease with plenty of space for radiators and fans. Great cable management behind the motherboard panel. Highly recommend.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Case fits everything that you could need it to, I run a full atx with cpu water cooling and full size graphics card and it sit there great, looks great with the build, highly recommend, no issues or problems so far

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: This case has been really great so far! So easy to install cables, as I built my first pc someone recommended this case to me and I couldn’t recommend it enough, If your looking for something pretty simple and easy I would recommend this case!

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: I liked it, simple to install and organize the cables. I miss the fan in the back of the case.Beautiful and good material.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: The Case Is Fantastic. Clean, Simple And Has A Lot Of Airflow.Filters Can Be Change With Ease And Just So Simple. Highly Recomend

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Excellent airflow, PC rarely ever runs hot, excellent case.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Fantastic build quality, plenty of airflow and cable management space. Included fans are very loud though.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Received as ordered, Genuine, Fast & reliable supplier

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Ordered at 10pm and arrived by 10am next day. Well packaged, installed and performed as described. Nice slick looking case.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: What's bit to like? Plenty of space, tonnes of fan spaces, air filters and a tempered glass side view. Amazing product.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: One of the best cases available for a convenient price. The two 120 mm fans included provide your build with a silent, but powerful cooling system. I would personally recommend this case to anyone considering building your own gaming or personal computer

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Very nice product

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Has got to be one of the best airflow ATX case out there. Cable management was a breeze for this case.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Great value for money case. Generous space for a mid tower and nice and quiet once all put together. Would buy again.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Great all rounder case. Side panels could use with a better system for removal.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Great for hardcore hot build

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Exactly what I was looking for, however my mobo doesn’t have usb c but I don’t need it, tempered glass, easy to install, 2 no rgb included.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Side panel doesn't sit flush with the cases front panel. HDD tray cannot be installed when using the lower cut bottom front section included with the case.Oh and also - the side window exploded. Everywhere.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Glass on Left Side Shattered with no pressure on left side on day of install, 1 day after delivery. Id expect this to occur on right if cables were presing but there was nothing against the glass and it litterlly just shattered. Very disapointed.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Easy case to build in. Looks great. Good airflow and cooling performance. Many good features.
